cause.description:
Global warming is a hoax, its definitely not hot enough! I mean, i can walk outside for 10 minutes without having to drink anything, you call that hot? God? Is this the best you can do?
1. Increase Climate change
2. After the earths temp is up atleast 20 more degrees, dance to "its getting hot in here" by Nelly, buck naked
3. The roof, the roof, the roof is on Fia
cause.mission: To Increase the temprature of Planet Earth
cause.name: Increase "Global Warming"
